full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI TSOGS 'KHOR GYI CHO GA RNAL 'BYOR ROL PA'I DGA' STON CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (CES RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI TSOGS 'KHOR GYI CHO GA RNAL 'BYOR ROL PA'I DGA' STON CES BYA BA 'DI YANG ZHVA DMAR SNGAGS PA GU RU BKRA SHIS KYI BSKUL BA DANG, LHA DANG 'DI NYID YI DAM DU BYED PA MANG PO LA'ANG PHAN PAR MTHONG NAS, ,RGYAL KHAMS NYUL BA'I DHARMA BADZRA GYIS TSOGS 'KHOR SPYI DANG SGO PA LCAN CING YIG RNYING GI DGONGS PA DANG YANG MI 'GAL BAR, SNA TSO, DBYIG CES PA SHING MO SPRUL KYI LO MI'I DBANG PO WANG RATNA SIDDHI'I PHO BRANG DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG KUN DGA' BGYIS SO, ,DGE'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR, ,)
